definition: منطق manṭaqa to gird (ب هـ s.th. with) II to gird o.s., swathe o.s. (ب with), wind around one’s body (ب s.th.) منطق manṭiq (faculty of) speech; manner of speaking, diction, enunciation; eloquence; logic │ ليس من المنطق ان it is illogical to …; علم المنطق ‘ilm al-m. logic منطق minṭaq pl. مناطق manāṭiq2 belt, girdle
